name: javelina
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a wild animal similar to a pig, found in the southwestern US and in Central and South America: The javelina's diet can include almost anything, including snakes and young deer. The wolves prey on elk, deer, and javelina. Synonym
peccary
More examplesFewer examplesTexas javelinas are territorial, cud-chewing mammals that run in herds of up to 40 animals. The javelina, or collared peccary, is often called a pig, but it is not a pig. In less developed areas near Tucson, deer, coyotes, mountain lions, javelina and bobcat persist.As a wildlife manager in Arizona, O'Brien occasionally had to trap and relocate animals such as skunks, javelinas, bears and mountain lions.
